title: Does South Africa guzzle 235 litres of water per person daily?
subtitle: How much water does South Africa consume on average? And how does it compare to international standards? We looked at the best available evidence.
author: africacheck.org

“The average per capita consumption that we have quoted previously...[is] based on the total water supplied to a town divided by the population,” Mckenzie told Africa Check.
